movies.title: Das Pferdemädchen
movies.plot: The story plays in the countryside of north east Germany. Irka, a young girl lives with her father on a farm when they decide to buy a mare called Raya. She used to be a great show horse but now was old and almost blind. Nevertheless Irka rides out with Raya every day, describing her the way. But then she gives birth to a stallion which they name Mischka and Irka convinces her father to keep the foal forever. Her father though realizes that it's financially not possible to keep both horses and he wants to give Mischka to a stud where it would be cheaper to raise him. Irka has to decide if she wants to keep the old mare or the foal.
movies.simplePlot: The story plays in the countryside of north east Germany. Irka, a young girl lives with her father on a farm when they decide to buy a mare called Raya. She used to be a great show horse ...

biography.bio: Ilse Voigt was born on February 3, 1905 in Pirna, Germany. She was an actress, known for The Rabbit Is Me (1965), Der Mann, der nach der Oma kam (1972) and Der tapfere Schulschwänzer (1967). She was married to Fritz Meindl and Hans Wahlberg. She died on June 3, 1990 in Magdeburg, German Democratic Republic.
biography.name: Ilse Voigt

biography.bio: Hans Klering was born on November 8, 1906 in Berlin, Germany. He was an actor and director, known for Die Meere rufen (1951), Manana, Manana (1965) and The Patriots (1933). He was married to Else Korén and Antonia Nizkowskaja. He died on October 30, 1988 in East Berlin, East Germany.
biography.name: Hans Klering

biography.bio: Wolfgang Winkler was born on March 2, 1943 in Görlitz, Germany. He is an actor, known for Bukow and König (1971), The Rabbit Is Me (1965) and Ein Schneemann für Afrika (1977).
biography.name: Wolfgang Winkler

biography.bio: Annette Roth is an actress, known for Christine (1963), Jadup und Boel (1980) and Unser kurzes Leben (1981).
biography.name: Annette Roth

biography.name: Kathrin Mock

biography.bio: Harry Merkel was born on December 27, 1929 in Radebeul, Saxony, Germany. He is an actor, known for Der Fall mit dem blauen Rubin (1966), Abenteuer mit den Abrafaxen (1980) and The Devil's Three Golden Hairs (1977).
biography.name: Harry Merkel

biography.bio: Marlies Mai is an actress, known for Das Pferdemädchen (1979).
biography.name: Marlies Mai

biography.bio: Karl-Heinz Lotz was born on November 27, 1946 in Teicha, Petersberg, Saxony-Anhalt, Germany. He is a director and writer, known for Junge Leute in der Stadt (1985), Iron Jack (1988) and Trillertrine (1991).
biography.name: Karl-Heinz Lotz

biography.bio: Andreas Albert is known for his work on Man nennt mich jetzt Mimi... (1976), Das Pferdemädchen (1979) and Ich will euch sehen (1978).
biography.name: Andreas Albert
